Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards

Interface CustomMode

All Known Implementing Classes:
MultiplePlayer, SinglePlayer
public interface CustomMode
public interface containing endTurnAction method which sets a new current player in case of a multiplayer match and manages Lorenzo's actions in case of a single player match

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFaithToOthers​(int amount, GameBoard gameBoard)
    adds faith to the other players (or to Lorenzo in a single player match) when a resource is discarded
    void endTurnAction​(GameBoard gameBoard)
    changes the current player in a multiplayer match or manages Lorenzo's actions in a single player match
    java.lang.String findWinner​(java.util.ArrayList<Board> boards)  
    java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> showFaithLorenzo()  
    java.util.Optional<java.util.List<ItemStatus>> showSectionsLorenzo()  
    java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> showTopToken()  

  • Method Details

    • endTurnAction

      void endTurnAction​(GameBoard gameBoard)
      changes the current player in a multiplayer match or manages Lorenzo's actions in a single player match
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - represents the game board

    • addFaithToOthers

      void addFaithToOthers​(int amount, GameBoard gameBoard)
      adds faith to the other players (or to Lorenzo in a single player match) when a resource is discarded
      Parameters:
      amount - indicates how many faith points have to be added
      gameBoard - represents the game board

    • findWinner

      java.lang.String findWinner​(java.util.ArrayList<Board> boards)
      Parameters:
      boards - contains the boards related to each player
      Returns:
      returns a map (nickName - totalPoints)

    • showFaithLorenzo

      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> showFaithLorenzo()
      Returns:
      Optional Integer which represent, if not empty, the faith points of Lorenzo

    • showSectionsLorenzo

      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<ItemStatus>> showSectionsLorenzo()
      Returns:
      Optional List of ItemStatus which represents, if not empty, the status of the pope sections of Lorenzo

    • showTopToken

      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> showTopToken()
      Returns:
      Optional String which represents, if not empty, the ID of the top token
